item.title: Four killed in strike on central Kyiv, Ukraine says
item.description: Windows were shattered and a fire broke out in a non-residential building in Shevchenkivskyi district, officials say.

item.title: TikTok says it will 'go dark' on Sunday without US government action
item.description: The Supreme Court earlier upheld a law that would ban the video app in the US unless its Chinese parent-company sells it.

item.title: Temples, treasures and trade: The astonishing legacy of India's Chola dynasty
item.description: The Cholas were a powerful south Indian dynasty known for military conquests, grand temples and shaping global trade and culture.

item.title: Has Trump promised too much on US economy?
item.description: He won the election to fix inflation but Trump may find his pledges on prices and tariffs can't both win out, say experts.

item.title: Trapped underground with decaying bodies, miners faced a dark reality
item.description: Mzwandile Mkwayi volunteered to go down into the shaft to help save the lives of scores of South African miners.
